title: KAPTAN Funny Notepads - Teacher Themed, For Classroom Organization, Daily Planner, Desk Organizer, Colorful, Fun Sticky Notes, Track Student Assignments, Schedules, and To Do Lists
features: Fun Sticky Notes for Teachers – Designed with educators in mind these hilarious teacher writing pads come in lined and unlined pages and feature four super funny notes at the top that embody what it means to be a teacher with a sense of humor.

Classroom and Desk Organizer – A smart way to organizer your teacher notes these teacher daily planner notepads are easy to keep in a drawer in your desk, take with you to meetings, keep in your bag or purse, and use at home for inspiration.

Peel-and-Stick Adhesive Top – The back of each of our writing pads has a sticky adhesive that makes it easier for you to attach a sheet to a stack of papers, a filing cabinet, your desk, or anywhere else you need a reminder.

Vibrant, Colorful Teacher Images – From a classic yellow notepad to cute little pencils each of our teacher notepads for classroom use has an iconic image that adds a bit more fun and original style to your note taking.

Great Teacher Appreciation Gift – Now more than ever is a great time to recognize your child’s teacher or your spouse’s dedication to their job. Get them this 4-pack of funny notepads today and remind them how valuable they are to their students.
description: Enjoy a quick laugh while you’re taking notes and staying ahead of that busy classroom schedule with these hilarious teacher notepads.

Let’s be honest, you don’t get paid nearly enough for all the work you do. And while parents are quickly learning that trying to teach their child at home on their own is challenging, you’re managing 20-30 kids every day, all day. You deserve a medal, or a trophy, or your own tropical island.
While we can’t offer you that island, we can make those days a little less stressful with these hilarious personal organizer
KAPTAN Funny Teacher’s Notepads
that help you keep everything on track and have a laugh every time you look down to add something new to your list.
This 4-pack of notepads features four hilarious sayings, peel-and-stick tops so you can attach them to things, and a more portable size so you can take notes at meetings or jot things down on the go.
